attributes.review: This needs to be able to be utilitzed on my Mac also.  Please make one that works on a computer so I don't have to type with one finger
attributes.title: Need this for Mac

attributes.review: This app does a great job to compile Trump's campaign into a single app while introducing a fun challenge to collect Action Points. Make America Great Again!
attributes.title: A great way to keep up with Trump

attributes.review: I've had this app for an hour and my energy levels are higher than ever.
attributes.title: Make Apps Great Again

attributes.review: Glad to see the app is finally displayed on the App Store's featured page alongside Hillary's (even though this app was available for months).
attributes.title: Trump 2016

attributes.review: Easy to use. Easy to navigate. Everything one needs to know in a single place. Great idea. Perfect execution. Well done!
attributes.title: Well done, Trump Campaign!

attributes.review: I really love all of the information this app has. You can register to vote, you can donate, learn facts, see Trump's positions. It's a well designed app!
attributes.title: Informative

attributes.review: Very interesting and brings you up to date on key issues and upcoming events! Love it! Highly recommended!
attributes.title: Amazing

attributes.review: This app. It's the greatest app. What can I say? We are gonna make America safe again. We are going to make America rich again. We are going to make America GREAT AGAIN. Starting with this app.
attributes.title: This app is YUGGGGEEEE

attributes.review: This app is genius and a great way to stay connected to all things Trump when you are busy. Download and don't forget to vote Trump!
attributes.title: Genius!
